description: As a Lead Developer, I navigated a challenging and thrilling journey, guiding the creation and perfection of both the website and API for a UK-based company eCommerce platform specializing in the sale of audio software products.

achievements.title: Designed and Implemented Robust API & Database
Innovative A/B Audio Player Development
Developed Intuitive Admin & User Dashboards
Active Involvement in Decision-Making
Optimized website SEO and Performance
Effective Team Management and Leadership
Integrated Payment Gateways for Seamless Transactions
Contributed to Page Design and Aesthetics
Managed VPS and Nginx for Efficient Hosting
Integrated Multiple Tracking Solutions

description: Played a key role in the development and administration of an eCommerce website for a company focused on audio plugins development.

achievements.title: Led the Development of an eCommerce Website and System
Effectively Managed and Led Development Teams
Provided Input in Decision-Making Processes
Architected and Implemented API & Database
Implemented strategic SEO enhancements and performance optimizations
Successfully integrated and configured Stripe and PayPal payment processing

description: In my initial role as a Full-time Full Stack Developer within a prominent tech company, I took on the challenge of overseeing multiple projects concurrently, collaborating closely with a skilled team of managers, designers and developers.

achievements.title: Collaborated with Cross-Functional Teams on Diverse Projects
Managed IoT API Infrastructure for Seamless Integration
Transformed Websites into React-Based Interactive Platforms
Developed and Deployed Server Monitoring Systems
Partnered with Incubated Startups to Create Bespoke Websites
Contributed to Developers Recruitment and Onboarding

description: During an intensive 8-month period, I actively applied the range of technologies I had learned to a variety of projects. These included both personal endeavors and freelance work, offering me practical experience in real-world settings

achievements.title: Contributed to Freelance Projects, Delivering Tailored Solutions
Studied and practiced making Shopify themes.
Refined Front-End Development skills through personal projects.

Crafted an Employees Management Software as part of Computer Science School Thesis
